title: rlp: element is larger than containing list
body:
VER: Commit: 82f1e9f342ae46d38f41b0561f879f192cdd8fa0 [82f1e9f]
GO 1.20.10

`
WARN[10-19|01:41:01.586] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="rlp: element is larger than containing list"
WARN[10-19|01:41:03.819] newPayload failed                        err="rlp: element is larger than containing list"
WARN[10-19|01:41:03.819] fail to process block                    reason="rlp: element is larger than containing list" slot=7568891
WARN[10-19|01:41:03.819] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="rlp: element is larger than containing list"
`


f26be2c4c36f1df7523febf6fc197e7204cfb8c0
